bibl.title: J.A. HARRELL and R.S. TOMBER, The Roman Quarry and Installations in Wadi Umm Wikala and Wadi Semna. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Survey 1997-2000 of the quarry and related settlement in the Wadi Semna - Wadi Umm Wikala area (ancient Ophites) in the central part of the Eastern Desert. The extraction of gabbro (uncorrectly identified as diorite) and the occupation took place from the first century AD through the second or early third century AD. - Pp. 138-142: S.E.G. XX, 670 = S.B. VIII, 10173: text, translation, commentary.
bibl.seg: SIDEBOTHAM S.E., H. BARNARD, J.A. HARRELL and R.S. TOMBER, The Roman Quarry and Installations in Wadi Umm Wikala and Wadi Semna. Avec résumé en anglais.
JEA 87 (2001) pp. 135-170, 3 tabl., 41 profils, 2 cartes, 9 plans et pll. XX-XXVI.

Survey 1997-2000 of the quarry and related settlement in the Wadi Semna - Wadi Umm Wikala area (ancient Ophites) in the central part of the Eastern Desert. The extraction of gabbro (uncorrectly identified as diorite) and the occupation took place from the first century AD through the second or early third century AD. - Pp. 138-142: S.E.G. XX, 670 = S.B. VIII, 10173: text, translation, commentary.
